author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all, stemming from the updates at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45764.
It might be useful to have a piece a configuration to create alignment record for new Phase-2 geometries.

#### PR validation:

`scram b runtests_test_CreateReferenceRecords`

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, no backport needed.
title: add a unit test for `createTrackerAlignmentRcds`
